mapper.insert: insert into comment (id, parent_id, `type`, commentator, gmt_create, gmt_modify, like_count, `comment`) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{commentator,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{gmtModify,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{likeCount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update comment set parent_id = #{parentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, `type` = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER}, commentator = #{commentator,jdbcType=INTEGER}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=BIGINT}, gmt_modify = #{gmtModify,jdbcType=BIGINT}, like_count = #{likeCount,jdbcType=BIGINT}, `comment` = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, parent_id, `type`, commentator, gmt_create, gmt_modify, like_count, `comment` from comment
